title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 621.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 621.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to applicants (see glossary, section
621.17
of this Part) that propose
to develop or finance community facilities (see glossary) for persons with
developmental disabilities, based on expenditures for those costs as set forth
herein. This Part relates to community facilities subject to certification by
the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities. In addition this Part is
applicable to those applicants that propose to develop or finance community
facilities for persons with developmental disabilities which may be subject to
certification or licensure by another appropriate New York State
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
621.1

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
